objects.text:
• Powerful Motor Performance
• 3 Versatile Stainless Steel Jars
• Multiple Speed Settings
• Safety-Lock Mechanism

product_details.name: Sujata Dynamix Power Mixer Grinder - 3 Jars | Premium Kitchen Powerhouse
product_details.description:
• Powerful motor for efficient grinding and mixing performance
• Comes with 3 versatile stainless steel jars for different grinding needs
• Transparent dome-shaped lids with measuring cup functionality
• Ergonomic jar handles for comfortable grip and pouring
• Speed control dial with multiple settings (Low, Med, High)
• Durable stainless steel blades for consistent grinding
• Sturdy white ABS body construction for long-lasting use
• Safety-lock mechanism for secure operation
• Ideal for wet & dry grinding, chutney making, and blending
• Compact design perfect for modern kitchens
• Easy to clean and maintain
• Perfect for Indian cooking needs
• Anti-skid feet for stable operation
• Overload protection for motor safety

banner_details:
The banner is a promotional design for a kitchen appliance, structured into two vertical halves. The left half has a soft gray and lavender background, serving as the text-focused promotional area, while the right side showcases the product image prominently against a minimal white space with faint geometric accents. The "heading" text layer uses a large bold font with strong emphasis to announce the brand and product line. Underneath, the "tagline," "subheading," and "product_name" layers provide inspirational and descriptive messages. The “description” layer lists product features in bullet points, placed in the lower lavender section. A bold "price" layer and a vibrant purple call-to-action "cta_button" with “SHOP NOW” in the “cta” layer are positioned at the bottom, encouraging immediate purchase. The "product_image" is centrally placed over the vertical split, enhancing visual focus. 

**Color Palette:**
- Lavender (#E0E0E0 and #9C27B0 with opacity variations)
- Soft Gray (#F5F5F5)
- Deep Purple (#9C27B0)
- White (#FFFFFF)
- Charcoal Gray (#333333 & #555555)
product_color: The product image features a sleek and modern mixer grinder set dominated by a clean white base (#FFFFFF) that exudes simplicity and purity. Accents of polished stainless steel (#C0C0C0) on the jars add a professional, premium feel, while clear plastic lids (#E0E0E0 with high transparency) blend seamlessly yet remain distinct. A standout detail is the deep purple button (#8B3D9A), creating a visual focal point and touch of vibrance. The brand logo adds subtle hints of teal (#00B8BA), red (#D43F3A), and green (#6ABF4B), giving variety without overpowering. The overall palette is harmonious with effective contrast, ideal for a high-end, clean marketing banner.
